attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever had on my phone like wtc. It take 3 weeks just to finish downloading.🤬🤬🤬🤬 It made me put In my location. Which 2 days later brought 3 clowns wearing a tshirt saying  #trump2020 to be door....I HATE CLOWS🤡. They did a ridiculous dance then they made my family strip down to nakedness. 🍑 Then they made up play naked limbo on roller skates. Uhhhhhhhhhhh never download the app guys it just a trick to just get abused by trump clowns 🤡
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: I can’t believe that this is still on the app store. when i first opened it, Trump jumped out of my screen and murdered my family! Then he held me captive while forcing me to sing the duck song on a loop for ten hours! I was finally able to escape when he fell asleep and i punched him back into the app but as a result i had to throw away my whole phone. Anyways, Niall Horan for president 2020.
attributes.title: terrible awful despicable app

attributes.review: Soooo this app charged me 1000 dollars just for it to glitch and for me to see an orange face. But it took weeks to download. When I got on the app I just wanted to see our peachy president. But all I saw was white supremacy. 👁👄👁. Then I saw cockroaches that we’re summoned from the app. They ate my vegan food and then the rats ate my dog. I’m scarred for life. 0-10 I would give a zero, wast of my life. I need mental help for the rest of my existence. Anyway #killtrump2020.
attributes.title: Ew

attributes.review: When I opened the app, I was excited to look at the great updates and support trump. But when I decided to go on to Twitter, it wouldn’t let me exit!! I tried multiple strategies such as pressing the home button three times, closing and opening my phone, NOTHING WORKED!! I had to fully reset my phone for me to finally get out of it. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!! It 100% ruined and hacked my phone.
attributes.title: couldn’t get out?!?

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I’m a Trump supporter but as soon as I did all these snakes came out of my phone, then they attacked my whole family and killed them all. After a voice was coming from the phone speaking a really wierd language and after my phone shattered and exploded, that explosion paralyzed my whole body exept my hands and fingers. Do NOT download this app!!!!
attributes.title: Killed my family

attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! I downloaded for my love💖 of our beautiful president. But after i have it my number i got multiple text telling me my home address, fat shaming my grandma, and performing a satanic ritual. But it didn’t in their when opened the app would just crash, so i never got to show my love for me trump. I can’t wait till this app gets deleted for trying to market off of a GREAT president. 🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊
attributes.title: Don’t download

attributes.review: I believe we should all be free to say and do whatever we want it’s our first amendment right and if the orange man 🍊wants to quiet our voices by taking away the platform we use to make our voices heard then I will try my best to do the same to him by getting his campaign app deleted from the Apple store. To whoever may be reading this please rate the app one star. Thank you and have a blessed day💞
attributes.title: Just Awful

attributes.review: The app downloaded pretty quickly and so I thought it would be all good, I was wrong. Every time I open the app it starts glitching and then kicks me out. At one point I actually made it into the app but then a terrible high pitched screeching sound started playing and it made my ears bleed. I had to delete the app right after, please don’t get this, it’s for your own saftey.
